text.value: The dwelling unit is at risk of:
**Dominant Construction Material of the main Dwelling Unit**
How many habitable ROOMS does this dwelling unit contain?
Duration Of Residence In This Place:
Does this household own any of the following items that are functioning:
How many DEATHS occurred in this household in the last 12 months?
How many LIVE BIRTHS occurred in this household in the last 12 months?
What are the conditions of the household ?
How many of each of the following livestock are currently owned by this household?
What type of BENEFIT do you receive?
How MUCH was the benefit in the last receipt?
Is anyone in this household receiving benefits from any other Social Assistance Programme or any other external support?
In the past 7 days, did anyone in this household cut the size of the meals or skip meals because of the lack of enough money?
Main mode of human waste disposal

This is a household survey that will be happening annually for the first 3 years and thereafter every 2 years and the target is to reach all households in your catchment area. It is important that you collect all information correctly. You are expected to reach ALL your assigned households. Please interview the household head (father or mother). If not available, interview a household member who is 18 years and above who can provide the required information. Note the person you will be getting the information from. If there is no one, make plans to revisit the house.

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Duration cannot be more than a year
Any number greater than 12 should be converted to a year
A person dwelling house cannot have more than 20 rooms
None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!
This field can only have letters and numbers
